scenes.narrative_beat: राजू अपने घर की छत पर बैठकर तारों को देख रहा है।
scenes.visual_prompt: SUBJECT: Raju, a 10-year-old Indian boy with messy dark hair, wearing a faded orange cotton t-shirt and grey shorts. ACTION: He sits cross-legged on a weathered stone rooftop, leaning forward with his chin resting on his palms, staring upward with wide eyes full of wonder at the vast night sky. SETTING: An old, rustic Indian village at night; silhouettes of mud houses and palm trees are visible under a dense canopy of stars. CAMERA: A slow 35mm wide-angle dolly push-in, starting from a wide shot of the roof and ending on a medium close-up of Raju’s face. LIGHTING: Moody, cool 5600K moonlight coming from the upper right, casting deep cinematic shadows with soft blue highlights on his hair.
scenes.camera_movement: Slow 35mm dolly push-in from wide to medium close-up, 2.39:1 aspect ratio.
scenes.mood_lighting: Cool 5600K moonlight, low-key lighting with high contrast and deep blue shadows.
scenes.audio_suggestion: Soft ambient night sounds, crickets chirping, and a gentle, ethereal synth pad.
scenes.character_details: Raju looks peaceful and curious, his eyes blinking slowly as they reflect the starlight; he is perfectly still, absorbed in the view.
scenes.continuity_notes: Establish the village setting and Raju's clothing (orange shirt/grey shorts) to be used throughout.

scenes.narrative_beat: आसमान से एक चमकीली रोशनी नीचे आती है।
scenes.visual_prompt: SUBJECT: Raju (10yo Indian boy, orange shirt). ACTION: He suddenly gasps, his body tensing as he flinches back, hands gripping the edge of the roof. His eyes track a brilliant golden streak of light descending rapidly from the clouds toward him. SETTING: Same rooftop in the old village. CAMERA: Handheld tracking shot following Raju's gaze from the sky down to the rooftop level, creating a sense of urgency. LIGHTING: The cool blue moonlight is suddenly overwhelmed by a piercing, warm 3000K golden flare that grows brighter as it approaches, illuminating Raju’s face in high-key amber light.
scenes.camera_movement: Handheld tracking shot, matching the speed of the descending light, ending on Raju's startled reaction.
scenes.mood_lighting: Dynamic shift from cool blue to intense warm golden 3000K flare.
scenes.audio_suggestion: A rushing wind sound effect building into a shimmering metallic hum.
scenes.character_details: Raju is visibly scared but remains rooted in place, his pupils dilating as the light nears; his breathing becomes rapid and shallow.
scenes.continuity_notes: The light source must appear to come from the exact direction Raju was looking in Scene 1.

scenes.narrative_beat: रोशनी एक नन्हीं परी के रूप में बदल जाती है।
scenes.visual_prompt: SUBJECT: A 6-inch tall ethereal fairy with translucent, iridescent butterfly wings and a glowing silver-white silk dress, materializing from the golden orb. ACTION: She hovers 3 feet above the roof tiles, her wings fluttering in a blur of light; she tilts her head and offers a gentle, radiant smile, slowly extending her tiny glowing right hand toward Raju. SETTING: Same rooftop, Raju's face visible in the blurred foreground. CAMERA: Macro-style f/2.8 shallow depth of field, focusing sharply on the fairy's intricate features. LIGHTING: The fairy acts as a 4500K iridescent light source, casting a soft, magical glow on everything nearby.
scenes.camera_movement: Static macro shot with shallow DOF, focusing on the fairy's transformation.
scenes.mood_lighting: Ethereal 4500K iridescent glow emanating from the fairy; soft bokeh in the background.
scenes.audio_suggestion: Tinkling bell sounds mixed with a soft, melodic female vocal hum.
scenes.character_details: The fairy looks kind and ancient yet youthful; her movements are fluid and weightless, her hand reaching out with an inviting gesture.
scenes.continuity_notes: Ensure the golden light from Scene 2 transforms seamlessly into the fairy's glow.

scenes.narrative_beat: राजू और परी की उंगलियाँ मिलती हैं, जादुई चमक फैलती है।
scenes.visual_prompt: SUBJECT: Raju's trembling index finger and the fairy’s tiny hand. ACTION: Raju slowly reaches out, his face transitioning from fear to awe. As his fingertip touches the fairy's small palm, a massive shockwave of sparkling white and gold particles erupts, filling the frame with light. SETTING: Same rooftop. CAMERA: Extreme close-up on the point of contact, then a rapid zoom-out as the light explodes. LIGHTING: Blindingly bright 6000K white flash at the moment of contact, followed by swirling multicolored magical trails.
scenes.camera_movement: Extreme close-up zooming out rapidly to a wide shot during the magical burst.
scenes.mood_lighting: High-intensity 6000K white flash, followed by vibrant, saturated magical colors.
scenes.audio_suggestion: A crystalline 'ding' sound followed by a powerful, uplifting orchestral swell.
scenes.character_details: Raju's hand is shaking slightly until the moment of contact, where he suddenly looks empowered and ecstatic.
scenes.continuity_notes: The light burst serves as the visual bridge to the flying sequence.

scenes.narrative_beat: राजू और परी बादलों के ऊपर उड़ रहे हैं।
scenes.visual_prompt: SUBJECT: Raju (10yo Indian boy, orange shirt) and the tiny fairy. ACTION: They soar through the night sky above a sea of wispy white clouds; Raju has his arms spread wide, his hair blowing fiercely in the wind, a look of pure joy on his face as the fairy leads him by the hand. SETTING: High altitude above the clouds; far below, the village appears as a tiny cluster of warm yellow toy-like lights nestled in the dark landscape. CAMERA: A cinematic drone-style arc shot, rotating 360 degrees around the pair as they fly. LIGHTING: Cool, bright moonlight from above and a warm golden trail of stardust following them.
scenes.camera_movement: Cinematic 360-degree arc shot, rotating around the flying characters with a wide-angle lens.
scenes.mood_lighting: Dreamy 5600K moonlight mixed with a warm 3000K golden stardust trail.
scenes.audio_suggestion: Wind rushing sounds, triumphant orchestral music with flutes and violins.
scenes.character_details: Raju’s clothes and hair react to the high-speed wind; the fairy looks effortless as she guides him through the sky.
scenes.continuity_notes: The village below must visually match the architecture and layout established in Scene 1, but from a distance.
